review: I had a very pleasant experience here a Tanzi dental Mylapore .I got my braces fixed and a specialist has done it.The job is perfectly done and I can see good changes in 3 months.I was having lot of spacing in my front tooth and now I can see the gap been covered. Doctors said it will take more few months to completely close the gaps. Appointments are properly planned and happy with orthodontist specialist She is so friendly and I feel so comfortable with her treatment. Dr. Tanzila helped me out throughout the procedure and  She keeps following up.

review: My kid had severe pain and swelling in his teeth for past 1week..he is 9 yrs old and he was having a sleepless night. He was not able to eat aswel. Dr. Tanzila checked his teeth and explained the treatment what should be done. She suggested for a pulpectomy procedure. One specialist doctor came to do the procedure and dr. tanzila was helping in completing the whole procedure. She was very caring and treated like a family member. After the treatment pain and swelling reduced.
